scenes.description: A high-energy montage featuring a scrolling gallery of handwritten support messages, fan art, and illustrations from the community for 'hololive 6th fes. Color Rise Harmony'.
Transition to the official waiting screen for hololive STAGE3, displaying the full performer lineup and the official event hashtag.
